entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet/cecil links to cecil.pe which is an unrelated website #90865
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` for a default interface implementation #90863
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IEnumerable<int> for Range #90861
  • .net8.0.0-preview.7.23375.6, nativeaot, [Serializable] feature does not work #90860
  • IAsyncEnumerator question - clear Current when MoveNextAsync is called #90855

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `IndexOfAnyValues<string>` #85573
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Avoid `Enum.HasFlag` #90857
  • Compiler Error CS0407 'return-type method' has the wrong return type #90858
  • StringMarshaller can't handle strings created by malloc on Windows. #90856

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90864
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] new synchronization mechnism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome version used for testing #90823
    arch-wasm
  • Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90796
    area-System.Reflection
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Case: The method has not been jitted yet #90821
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Retry and Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
